scenario_text.value:
Labramon! I’m looking for the professor, have
you seen him?

The professor? Hmm, let’s see...
I think I saw him...

He was heading toward the shrine, so I’d
guess he’s over by the altar.
The altar, huh? Thanks for letting me know!

Aoi’s doing her best to pull everyone
together, so I’ve gotta do my part!
Aoi... Sounds like she’s had a hard time.

Yeah, you know how conscientious she can be.
She’s taken so much on herself...

But now that you’re back, I can tell how
relieved she is!

That right... It’s just like you say. I’ve
gotta do my part, too—for Aoi, and everyone!
